body_html: I have a code to train a segmentation network, which works well on a single-GPU setup. However, I encountered this issue when I am training the network on a multiple-GPU (2xK80) machine. The funny thing is that the first epoch was running just fine and I got this error at the beginning of the second epoch. Any ideas why?

The funny thing is that the first epoch was running just fine and I got this error at the beginning of the second epoch. Any ideas why?
body: I have a code to train a segmentation network, which works well on a single-GPU setup. However, I encountered this issue when I am training the network on a multiple-GPU (2xK80) machine. The funny thing is that the first epoch was running just fine and I got this error at the beginning of the second epoch. Any ideas why?
